value_type.description: The type that the value of the metafield represents (e.g., URL, text)

owner_id.description: The unique identifier of the entity that owns the metafield

created_at.description: The date and time when the metafield was created

description.description: The description of the metafield content

type.description: The data type of the metafield value (e.g., string, integer)

updated_at.description: The date and time when the metafield was last updated

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop where the metafield is associated

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The unique identifier for the metafield in the GraphQL Admin API

id.description: The unique identifier for the metafield

value.description: The actual value of the metafield

owner_resource.description: The resource type that owns the metafield (e.g., product, variant)

key.description: The key associated with the metafield for identifying purposes
